name: Silicon Beach Pitch Night - April 2020 (Online Event!)
description:
****** EVENT Changed to ONLINE via Zoom *****
Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic, this event is now changed to an online event via Zoom https://zoom.us/

The Zoom link will be sent to those who RSVP. Check your meetup organiser announcements and/or your email if you provided that when RSVPing.

Stay strong and stay well.
**********************************
Yes, for the first time we will be trialling online pitches. Letâ€™s try this. Letâ€™s have some fun ... we must, at this difficult time for everyone.

Got something to pitch?
Please signup on our website and register your pitch here https://siliconbeachgroup.org/pitch-request/

We will keep the online pitches to 90 seconds. So practice. Your mic will be muted after 90 seconds!

Did you know that anyone can do a 90 second pitch at a Silicon Beach Pitch Night? Yes, itâ€™s an open mic night for startups and small businesses who support startups. You can even pitch an idea to have it validated. Or pitch for a co-founder, techie or anyone else.

While we give priority to startups (Silicon Beach is a startup community) we do appreciate the part Small Businesses play in the startup eco-system. Small businesses who provide services to startups are welcome to pitch.

No pitch decks please - just you talking.

If your startup idea is good, we may ask you to pitch at a next level pitch night to take you through the startup journey towards capital raising via connections to angel investors, VCs, mentors, co-founders, customers etc. A SiliconIcubator is in the making. Come with us on the journey:)

It all starts with a 90 second pitch

~~~~~~~

We are on a mission to propel Australia to #2 ranked startup nation in the world by 2025. (Currently #5 as per https://www.startupblink.com/ )
That is our BHAG (Big Hairy Audacious Goal).

Watch what happed at our recent Melbourne Silicon Beach (MSB) Pitch Nights on Silicon Beach TV ðŸ“º
(Details of pitchers are in the YouTube description)

Have questions?
Join our Slack channel ( http://slack.siliconbeach.community/ ) and ask away.

Want to sponsor our community? Email [masked]
Details at http://bit.ly/SiliconSponsor
You are welcome to sponsor any of our events including this Pitch Night.

#EmpoweringFounders
https://www.siliconbeachgroup.org

Connect even more with your community, share your projects and ask for any help that you need right now. Join your Silicon Beach Community in just 3 minutes and share your startup, scale-up, business or yourself on our project page - https://siliconbeachgroup.org/projects/

â€”â€”-
Please note we will be recording this online Pitch Night on Zoom Cloud which will be uploaded to Silicon Beach TV YouTube - http://bit.ly/siliconbeachTV
Please be aware that when you RSVP and/or pitch, you give consent.
